creditline: Given in memory of C. Adrian and Elizabeth Rubel from their daughter, Adrienne
description: twisting dragon embroidered in gold metallic thread on a gold ground; notches cut on 3 sides with red flamelike embroidery; multicolored 'clouds' behind dragon
markings: untranslated tag, upper right corner, on back; remnants of paper tag, on back near center
title: Military Banner
